title: The Focus Izalco Max Road Bike is Stiffer, Less Aero, and Less … Comfortable?
content:
Faster is always better, right? Focus updates the Izalco Max to make it lighter, stiffer, and more aerodynamic than before.

Read the full article at The Focus Izalco Max Road Bike is Stiffer, Less Aero, and Less … Comfortable? on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
